page.title: 14GOLDHANGER - CHURCH STREET
page.content: {Church Street}is called Church Street because there is a Church in the Street.The Church is made of bricks and stones.There is also a School in Church Street but it has closed down. When I walked down Church Street I felt quite scared because of the graveyard,although when it is sunny it feels nice and peaceful.There is a small garage which is called the Bulldog,which was built in 1932.The garage,as I looked at it,was very small and he could only fit one car in to work on at a time.There is a public house called the Chequers and further up the road is another pub called the Cricketers.There is a house called{Goldhanger Hall}which is surrounded by trees.There is also an engineering works which specialises in agricultural machinery.
